name: The Bug Contest
description:
Instructions:  

In this game,  you need to catch as many bugs as possible under 60 seconds.

This Game can be played single-player or local-multi-player.

If you fall from the platform, you loose one-bug.

Controls:

Player1 (RedHat Guy) - Arrow keys to move left and right and Up arrow key to Jump.

Player2(BlueHat Guy) - A,D to move left and right and  W key to Jump.

This is my second game with Godot so there may be some glitches.

Github Repository Link https://github.com/Danman9800/TheBugContest
